title: Integrating Catholic Higher Education and Social Justice through Virtual Service Learning: Application in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Exploring virtual service-learning models to overcome post-COVID-19 limitations of in-person education, aiming to develop innovative pedagogies integrating math education practices with Catholic social justice values.

learning_goals: Mathematical modeling skills for solving social justice issues can be assessed in virtual simulation environments.
Educational practice plans reflecting Catholic social teachings can be designed through VR-based collaborative activities.
Mathematical approaches to analyzing community issues can be performed with over 80% accuracy using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
